title: Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, Black Dial Style: 98B406
descriptions:
Introducing the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, style 98B406 - a stunning masterpiece from the prestigious Marine Star collection. This exquisite timepiece boasts a sophisticated 6-hand chronograph and calendar, perfect for the modern gentleman.

The watch's gold-tone stainless steel case exudes luxury and durability, while the black unidirectional timing bezel with gold-tone accents adds a touch of sporty elegance. The domed mineral crystal protects the watch face, ensuring long-lasting beauty and scratch resistance.

Water-resistant up to 100 meters, the Bulova Marine Star is your reliable companion for both everyday activities and water sports. The black sunburst dial, adorned with gold-tone and silver-tone accents, is not only visually appealing but also functional, with luminescent hands and markers for easy reading in low-light conditions.

This remarkable watch offers a range of functions, including a chronograph, 24-hour display, and calendar, making it a versatile choice for any occasion. The bracelet, crafted from gold-tone stainless steel, features curved and faceted links for a comfortable fit and a sport foldover closure for secure fastening.

Experience the perfect blend of style, functionality, and durability with the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch. Make a statement and elevate your style today!
